TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use these values with the <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.GetPrintQueues%2A> method to list subsets of available print queues.
PushedMachineConnection and PushedUserConnection refer to policies that enable automated connection of machines and users to printers. See the section "Deploying Printers to Users or Computers by Using Group Policy" in the [Step-by-Step Guide for Print Management](http://technet2.microsoft.com/WindowsServer/en/Library/312b10cb-73ec-40c7-a4df-63dd7248d93d1033.mspx).
## Examples The following example shows how to use the EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes enumeration to get a subset of available print queues.
[!code-cs[EnumerateSubsetOfPrintQueues#ListSubsetOfPrintQueues](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/EnumerateSubsetOfPrintQueues/Program.cs#listsubsetofprintqueues)] [!code-vb[EnumerateSubsetOfPrintQueues#ListSubsetOfPrintQueues](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/enumeratesubsetofprintqueues/program.vb#listsubsetofprintqueues)] [!code-cpp[EnumerateSubsetOfPrintQueues#ListSubsetOfPrintQueues](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/enumeratesubsetofprintqueues/Program.cpp#listsubsetofprintqueues)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes Connections = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A print queue that is connected to the specified print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes DirectPrinting = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A print queue that sends a print job directly to printing instead of spooling the job first.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes EnableBidi = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: A print queue for a printer that has bidirectional communication enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes EnableDevQuery = int32(128)

Docs.summary: A print queue that holds its print jobs when the document and printer configurations do not match.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes Fax = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: A print queue that services a fax machine.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes KeepPrintedJobs = int32(256)

Docs.summary: A print queue that keeps jobs in the queue after printing them.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes Local = int32(64)

Docs.summary: A print queue that is installed as a local print queue on the specified print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes PublishedInDirectoryServices = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: A print queue that is visible in the directory of printers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes PushedMachineConnection = int32(262144)

Docs.summary: A print queue that was installed by using the Push Printer Connections computer policy. See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes PushedUserConnection = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: A print queue that was installed by using the Push Printer Connections user policy. See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes Queued = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A print queue that allows multiple print jobs in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes RawOnly = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: A print queue that spools only raw data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes Shared = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A print queue that is shared.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes TerminalServer = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: A print queue that is installed by the redirection feature in Terminal Services.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes WorkOffline = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: A print queue that can work offline.
